item.title: About
item.description: I’m is a solution architect, system analyst, system administrator and developer. I’ve been working for Indonesian Government since 2009 in Information and Communication Technology area. I’ve been involved in various projects including Indonesia Open Data Portal, National Complaint Handling System, and National Service Portal. I’m passionate about IT Strategic Planning, IT Security, DevOps, Open Source Software, Web Development, and Software Testing. In the area of web development, I have developed various applications for internal use and national level.
